DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this 3-month study is to evaluate subjective responses to an upgraded contact lens.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Lotrafilcon A Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Have normal ocular findings. Be able to wear the study lenses in the available powers. Currently wear contact lenses for a minimum of 5 days a week, and at least 8 hours a day. Wear Night & Day contact lenses. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Require concurrent ocular medication. Eye injury or surgery within twelve weeks prior to enrollment. Currently enrolled in an ophthalmic clinical trial. Any active corneal infection. Corneal refractive surgery. Wear AIR OPTIX NIGHT & DAY AQUA lenses. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
